#Text=Open a Demat Account in India
#Text=A demat account is a medium which allows individuals to convert and retain physical shares in electronic format .
#Text=Just like you require a bank account for savings and transactions , a demat account is required to hold securities , stocks , debentures , and investments .
#Text=You may use it to buy or sell stocks .
#Text=To buy shares , whether offline or online , it is mandatory to create a demat account .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Get in touch with a registered depository .
#Text=In order to open a demat account , you ’ll have to first get in touch with a registered depository participant ( DP ) .
#Text=For a list of registered DPs , visit the NSDL ( National Securities Depository Limited ) or CDSL ( Central Depository Services Limited ) websites .
#Text=Download the forms .
#Text=Download or collect the account opening forms from the respective DP ’s office or website .
#Text=Fill up the requested details in the account opening form and provide the necessary signatures .
#Text=Affix photographs and submit a copy of PAN Card , proof of address , bank statement or other documents as required by the company .
#Text=Or you can
#Text=Open an online demat account .
#Text=With Aadhar number , you can open a demat account online .
#Text=Select the right broker .
#Text=The broker who Open Demat Account With Aadhar number .
#Text=Fill in basic details .
#Text=Your Name , Mobile Number and Email id .
#Text=Set password .
#Text=Set a unique password and do n't share with anyone .
#Text=With help of password , you can continue your online application
#Text=Enter Pan Card details .
#Text=Broker fetch your details from a government authorized site , whether you are KRA register or not .
#Text=Pay account opening charges .
#Text=Pay account opening charges to your broker by net-banking or credit card .
#Text=Create DigiLocker .
#Text=The government approved Digilocker allows you to upload your personal documents . with help of you can share securely your data with your broker .
#Text=Fill KYC Details .
#Text=Fill out your personal information including name , mother 's name , bank account number , and trading experience .
#Text=Upload your documents .
#Text=Please upload your financial documents securely , including a canceled cheque , bank statement , income proof , signature copy , PAN card copy .
#Text=E-Sign with Aadhar .
#Text=You will receive OTP ( One Time Password ) on your mobile number and Email id .
#Text=Enter both OTP on Aadhar card website for eSign with Aadhar .
#Text=Wait the turn-around time .
#Text=It usually takes about a week or two for the welcome kit to reach you , depending on different company policies .
#Text=A demat account can be opened with zero balance in your account .
#Text=There is no compulsion to maintain a minimum balance either .
#Text=Nominate your nominee .
#Text=It is important that you add a nominee while applying for a demat account .
#Text=Check and double check the nominee details for accuracy .
#Text=This will enable the nominee to receive the benefits of your securities in the event of exigencies .
#Text=After opening an account , the DP will assign you a beneficial owner identification number that will be needed for all future transactions .
#Text=When you wish to sell your shares , you need to coordinate with your broker and give a ' Delivery Instruction ' to your DP .
#Text=Your account will then be debited with the number of shares sold by your DP .
#Text=You will receive the payment from your broker .
#Text=Trade .
#Text=Similarly , when you want to buy shares , inform your broker .
#Text=The shares that you bought will be credited into your account by the DP .
#Text=You can also use the trading account linked to your demat account to buy and sell shares online .
#Text=The DP will provide periodic statements of your transactions
#Text=Tips
#Text=Again , it ’s not necessary that lower rates automatically mean it ’s the best deal .
#Text=The charges for opening and maintaining the Demat account may differ depending on different DPs .
#Text=Research well before you picks up a DP of your choice .
#Text=Make sure to look at the DP ’s experience , technological proficiency in terms of the tools and interface it offers , customer service , etc. , before sign up for a demat account .
#Text=Avoid paying HIGH brokerage charges , Negotiate for Lower brokerage .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Never divulge your Demat account ID and password to anyone and keep it someplace safe
#Text=Never do Leveraged Trading ( Future n Options ) until you are fully aware with RISK involved .
